Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey there! People are revolting amidst soaring living costs where Victorians are coming under increasing financial pressure with a 31% increase in power disconnections. Mortgage holders have been experiencing record-high repayments with the Reserve Bank of Australia signaling further rate hikes. However, there is hope for some as some large companies are encouraging free flu vaccinations ahead of a predicted rough season. The Reserve Bank's record run of rate hikes is over, but monetary policy may tighten again resulting in the greatest pain for mortgage holders in 2024.
